name: Arcbound Wanderer
text: Modular—Sunburst (This creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.)

rulings.text: This card has modular—sunburst, a combination of two keyword abilities. The sunburst ability sets the number for the modular ability. Basically, the number of +1/+1 counters the Wanderer gets as it enters the battlefield is equal to the number of colors of mana used to pay its cost.

For the leaves-the-battlefield ability, the number of counters on Arcbound Wanderer at the time it left the battlefield is what’s relevant; the number of colors of mana used to pay its cost doesn’t matter anymore.
When the Wanderer leaves the battlefield, you may put the counters onto a single target artifact creature. You can’t split them among two or more artifact creatures.

If this creature gets enough -1/-1 counters put on it to cause its toughness to be 0 or less (or the damage marked on it to be lethal), modular will put a number of +1/+1 counters on the target artifact creature equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on this creature before it left the battlefield.

name: Avarice Totem
text: {5}: Exchange control of Avarice Totem and target nonland permanent.
flavor: Souls and steel, the essence of Mirrodin. Memnarch lacks one but has an abundance of the other.

rulings.text: It is possible to activate this ability in response to itself and generate some odd combinations. For example, if you control this card and another permanent, you can use this card’s ability and target the permanent you control. You can then use this card’s ability again and target a permanent your opponent controls. The second usage resolves first and you get your opponent’s permanent in exchange for this one. The first usage then resolves and swaps your other permanent for the Totem so you get it back. The net effect is that you can swap any non-land permanent you have for any of theirs if you can activate this ability twice. Note that your opponent does get the chance to use the Totem in between the resolutions of your two usages if they have the mana.

name: Doubling Cube
text: {3}, {T}: Double the amount of each type of unspent mana you have.
flavor: The cube's surface is pockmarked with jagged runes that seem to shift when unobserved.

rulings.text: Doubling Cube’s ability is a mana ability.
The “type” of mana is its color, or lack thereof (if the mana is colorless).

Any restrictions on the mana in your mana pool aren’t copied. For example, if you have {C}{W}{W}{B} with no restrictions on it in your mana pool and {U}{U}{U} that can be used only to cast artifact spells, you’ll end up with {C}{C}{W}{W}{W}{W}{B}{B}, {U}{U}{U} that can be used only to cast artifact spells, and {U}{U}{U} that can be used for anything.

name: Engineered Explosives
text:

{2}, Sacrifice Engineered Explosives: Destroy each nonland permanent with mana value equal to the number of charge counters on Engineered Explosives.

rulings.text: You can choose any value for X as you cast Engineered Explosives. The value chosen for X doesn't directly affect the number of charge counters Engineered Explosives enters the battlefield with, but it does let you pay more mana and thus spend more colors of mana to cast it.
Colorless mana won't give Engineered Explosives another charge counter. Colorless is not a color.
Tokens that aren't a copy of something else don't have a mana cost. Anything without a mana cost normally has a mana value of 0.
If a permanent has {X} in its mana cost, X is considered to be 0.

name: Eon Hub
text: Players skip their upkeep steps.
flavor: Its power source is time itself. It absorbs unused minutes and hours, bringing the end of existence always closer.

rulings.text: The upkeep step is skipped entirely. The turn proceeds from untap step to draw step.
Upkeep-triggered abilities don’t trigger, and “activate this ability only during your upkeep” abilities can’t be activated.
Any triggered abilities that triggered during the untap step will go onto the stack at the start of the draw step.

name: Fist of Suns
text: You may pay {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} rather than pay the mana cost for spells that you cast.
flavor:
"It is all in my grasp. Every petty dream, every grand scheme, every soul, every fear. It all flows through me and from me."
—Memnarch

rulings.text: This is an alternative cost to cast a spell.

You can’t pay more than one alternative cost for a spell. For example, you can’t cast a spell using its flashback ability by paying {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}. Likewise, you can’t pay {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to cast a creature with morph face down.
Note that combining this card with Mycosynth Lattice from the Darksteel set means that all spells can be cast for five mana of any type (colored or colorless).
If you pay {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} rather than pay the mana cost of a spell with {X} in its mana cost, the only legal choice for X is 0.

rulings.text: If your Grafted Wargear somehow ends up on an opponent’s creature and it then becomes unattached from that creature, you won’t be able to sacrifice that creature because you don’t control it.

You may activate this card’s equip ability targeting the creature that it is currently attached to, even if it’s the only creature you control. Since the equip ability costs zero, you can do this as many times as you like during your main phases, though it generally won’t do anything.

Grafted Wargear becomes unattached from the creature it’s equipping if you equip it to a new creature, if Grafted Wargear leaves the battlefield, if the equipped creature ceases to be a creature, or if Grafted Wargear ceases to be an Equipment. (It also becomes unattached if the equipped creature leaves the battlefield, but the triggered ability won’t do anything in that case.)

name: Guardian Idol
text:
Guardian Idol enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}: Guardian Idol becomes a 2/2 Golem artifact creature until end of turn.

rulings.text: A noncreature permanent that turns into a creature can attack, and its {T} abilities can be activated, only if its controller has continuously controlled that permanent since the beginning of their most recent turn. It doesn’t matter how long the permanent has been a creature.

If Guardian Idol has any +1/+1 counters on it, those counters will remain on it after it stops being a creature. Those counters will have no effect as long as Guardian Idol isn’t a creature, but they will apply again if it later becomes a creature.

Activating the last ability of Guardian Idol while it’s already a creature will override any effects that set its power or toughness to a specific value. Effects that modify power or toughness without setting them to a specific value will continue to apply.

name: Lantern of Insight

rulings.text: If the top card of your library changes while you’re casting a spell or activating an ability, the new top card won’t be revealed until you finish casting that spell or activating that ability.
When playing with the top card of your library revealed, if an effect tells you to draw several cards, reveal each one before you draw it.
The top card of your library isn’t in your hand, so you can’t suspend it, cycle it, discard it, or activate any of its activated abilities.

rulings.text: If Spinal Parasite is a 1/1 because it has two +1/+1 counters on it, you can remove both counters to pay for its activated ability.
Any permanent is a legal target for Spinal Parasite’s ability, not just one with a counter on it. The player who controls Spinal Parasite chooses which counter to remove from the targeted permanent.
Yes, this card’s base power/toughness is -1/-1. If it has five +1/+1 counters on it, it’s a 4/4 creature.

name: Summoner's Egg
text:
Imprint — When Summoner's Egg enters the battlefield, you may exile a card from your hand face down.
When Summoner's Egg dies, turn the exiled card face up. If it's a creature card, put it onto the battlefield under your control.

rulings.text: The card is imprinted face down. This means that other players don’t know what the card is and you can’t look at the card once it’s imprinted (until it’s turned face up, of course). Note that effects that exile cards, including all previous imprint cards, exile those cards face up unless the effect says otherwise.
If the card is not a creature card when it’s turned face up, it remains exiled face up.
Any “When this creature is turned face up” abilities that the exiled card may have don’t trigger because the card isn’t being turned face up while it’s on the battlefield.

foreignNames.name: Ei des Beschwörers

foreignNames.name: Ovo do Invocador

Quando Ovo do Invocador for colocado num cemitério vindo de jogo, volte com a face para cima o card estampado com a face para baixo. Se o card for um card de criatura, coloque-o em jogo sob o seu controle.

name: Vedalken Orrery
text: You may cast spells as though they had flash.
flavor: The model incorporated the fifth sun effortlessly, as if it had always known.

rulings.text: The controller of Vedalken Orrery can cast nonland artifact, creature, enchantment, and sorcery cards any time they could cast an instant. This includes on other players’ turns and during the upkeep step, draw step, combat phase, and end step.
This applies only to casting spells. It does not, for example, change when you may activate abilities that can only be activated “any time you could cast a sorcery”.

name: Vedalken Shackles
text:
You may choose not to untap Vedalken Shackles during your untap step.
{2}, {T}: Gain control of target creature with power less than or equal to the number of Islands you control for as long as Vedalken Shackles remains tapped.

rulings.text: The creature’s power and the number of Islands you control matter only when the ability is activated and when it resolves. After that, only the fact that Vedalken Shackles remains tapped matters. If the creature stops being a creature, you’ll keep control of it.
If Vedalken Shackles becomes untapped before its ability resolves, you won’t gain control of the creature.
If Vedalken Shackles leaves the battlefield, it’s no longer tapped, so the control-changing effect ends.

name: Beacon of Immortality
text: Double target player's life total. Shuffle Beacon of Immortality into its owner's library.
flavor: The cave floods with light. A thousand rays shine forth and meld into one.

rulings.text: If you double a negative life total, you do the real math. A life total of -10 becomes -20.
Beacon of Immortality’s effect counts as life gain (or life loss, if the life total was negative) for effects that trigger on or replace life gain (or life loss).
If a Beacon is countered or doesn’t resolve, it’s put into its owner’s graveyard, not shuffled into the library.

foreignNames.flavor: まるでヴィダルケンの首領みたいね。触れず、遠くて、どこにでもいるんだから。 ―― ニューロックの指導者ブルエナ

foreignNames.name: Guarda-de-Ronda Avançado
foreignNames.text:
Voar
{U}: Guarda-de-Ronda Avançado não pode ser alvo de mágicas ou habilidades neste turno.
foreignNames.flavor: "Eles são como seus mestres vedalkeanos: intocáveis, altivos e onipresentes." —Bruenna, líder dos Neuroques

foreignNames.name: 高等空卫
foreignNames.text:
飞行
{U}：高等空卫本回合不能成为咒语或异能的目标。
foreignNames.flavor: 「冷漠，难以接近，无所不在；一如其维多肯主子。」 ～纽若克统领布威娜

originalText:
Flying
{U}: Advanced Hoverguard can't be the target of spells or abilities this turn.

name: Artificer's Intuition
text: {U}, Discard an artifact card: Search your library for an artifact card with mana value 1 or less, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

foreignNames.name: Eingebung des Handwerkers
foreignNames.text: {U}, wirf eine Artefaktkarte aus deiner Hand ab: Durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einer Artefaktkarte mit umgewandelten Manakosten von 1 oder weniger, zeige diese Karte offen vor und nimm sie auf deine Hand. Mische danach deine Bibliothek.

foreignNames.name: Intuición del artífice
foreignNames.text: {U}, descartar una carta de artefacto de tu mano: Busca en tu biblioteca una carta de artefacto con coste de maná convertido de 1 o menos, muéstrala y ponla en tu mano. Luego baraja tu biblioteca.

foreignNames.name: Intuition de l'artificier
foreignNames.text: {U}, Défaussez-vous d'une carte d'artefact de votre main : Cherchez dans votre bibliothèque une carte d'artefact avec un coût converti de mana de 1 ou moins, révélez-la et mettez-la dans votre main. Mélangez ensuite votre bibliothèque.

foreignNames.name: Intuito dell'Artefice
foreignNames.text: {U}, Scarta una carta artefatto dalla tua mano: Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio, scegli una carta artefatto con costo di mana convertito pari o inferiore a 1, rivela quella carta e aggiungila alla tua mano. Poi rimescola il tuo grimorio.

foreignNames.name: 工匠の直感
foreignNames.text: {U}, あなたの手札からアーティファクト・カードを１枚捨てる：あなたのライブラリーから、点数でみたマナ・コストが１以下のアーティファクト・カードを１枚探し、そのカードを公開してあなたの手札に加える。その後、あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。

foreignNames.name: Intuição do Artesão
foreignNames.text: {U}, Descarte um card de artefato de sua mão: Procure em seu grimório por um card de artefato com custo de mana convertido menor ou igual a 1, revele-o e coloque-o em sua mão. Depois, embaralhe seu grimório.

foreignNames.name: 神器师的直觉
foreignNames.text: {U}，从你手上弃掉一张神器牌：从你的牌库中搜寻一张总法术力费用等于或小于1的神器牌，展示该牌，并置于你手上。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

originalText: {U}, Discard an artifact card from your hand: Search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost 1 or less, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

name: Beacon of Tomorrows
text: Target player takes an extra turn after this one. Shuffle Beacon of Tomorrows into its owner's library.
flavor: To look into its light is to meet the gaze of history.

rulings.text: If a Beacon is countered or doesn’t resolve, it’s put into its owner’s graveyard, not shuffled into the library.

foreignNames.name: Leitstern des Morgigen
foreignNames.text: Ein Spieler deiner Wahl erhält nach diesem Zug einen zusätzlichen Zug. Mische den Leitstern des Morgigen in die Bibliothek seines Besitzers.
foreignNames.flavor: Schaust du in sein Licht, trifft dich der Blick der Geschichte.

foreignNames.name: Faro del mañana
foreignNames.text: El jugador objetivo toma un turno adicional después de éste. Baraja el Faro del mañana en la biblioteca de su propietario.
foreignNames.flavor: Basta con contemplar su luz para sentir el peso de la historia.

foreignNames.name: Flambeau de l'Avenir
foreignNames.text: Le joueur ciblé joue un tour supplémentaire après celui-ci. Mélangez le Flambeau de l'Avenir à la bibliothèque de son propriétaire.
foreignNames.flavor: Fixer sa lumière équivaut à subir le regard de l'histoire.

foreignNames.name: Faro del Domani
foreignNames.text: Il giocatore bersaglio gioca un altro turno dopo questo. Rimescola il Faro del Domani nel grimorio del suo proprietario.
foreignNames.flavor: Scrutando nella sua luce si incontra lo sguardo della storia.

foreignNames.name: 明日の標
foreignNames.text: プレイヤー１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは、このターンの後に追加のターンを得る。明日の標をオーナーのライブラリーに加えて切り直す。
foreignNames.flavor: 光の中を見ることは、すなわち歴史とまみえることだ。

foreignNames.name: Guia dos Amanhãs
foreignNames.text: O jogador alvo joga um turno extra após este turno. Embaralhe Guia dos Amanhãs no grimório de seu dono.
foreignNames.flavor: Olhar para sua luz é encarar o olhar da história.

foreignNames.name: 来日信标
foreignNames.text: 目标牌手在本回合后进行额外的一个回合。将来日信标洗入其拥有者的牌库。
foreignNames.flavor: 眼神与光芒相遇时，你将和历史对望。

originalText: Target player takes an extra turn after this one. Shuffle Beacon of Tomorrows into its owner's library.

name: Blinkmoth Infusion
text:
Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)
Untap all artifacts.
flavor: Power begets power.

rulings.text: Blinkmoth Infusion untaps all artifacts on the battlefield, not just artifacts you control.
If you control no artifacts, Blinkmoth Infusion costs twelve generic mana and two blue mana to cast.

foreignNames.name: Blinkmotten-Infusion
foreignNames.text:
Affinität zu Artefakten (Dieser Zauberspruch kostet beim Ausspielen für jedes Artefakt, das du kontrollierst, {1} weniger.)
Enttappe alle Artefakte.
foreignNames.flavor: Macht erzeugt Macht.

foreignNames.name: Infusión de polillas titilantes
foreignNames.text:
Afinidad por artefactos. (Este hechizo te cuesta {1} menos para jugarlo por cada artefacto que controles.)
Endereza todos los artefactos.
foreignNames.flavor: El poder engendra poder.

foreignNames.name: Décoction de scintimite
foreignNames.text:
Affinité pour les artefacts (Ce sort coûte {1} de moins à jouer pour chaque artefact que vous contrôlez.)
Dégagez tous les artefacts.
foreignNames.flavor: La puissance engendre la puissance.

foreignNames.name: Infusione di Lampidotteri
foreignNames.text:
Affinità con gli artefatti (Questa magia costa {1} in meno per essere giocata per ogni artefatto che controlli.)
STAPpa tutti gli artefatti.
foreignNames.flavor: Il potere genera potere.

foreignNames.name: ちらつき蛾の注入
foreignNames.text:
親和（アーティファクト） （この呪文をプレイするためのコストは、あなたがコントロールするアーティファクト１つにつき{1}少なくなる。）
すべてのアーティファクトをアンタップする。
foreignNames.flavor: 力は力を生む。

foreignNames.name: Infusão de Moscolumes
foreignNames.text:
Afinidade por artefatos (Esta mágica custa {1} a menos para jogar para cada artefato que você controla.)
Desvira todos os artefatos.
foreignNames.flavor: Poder gera poder.

foreignNames.name: 光蛾灌输
foreignNames.text:
神器共鸣（你每操控一个神器，使用此咒语的费用便减少{1}来使用）
重置所有神器。
foreignNames.flavor: 力量产生更多力量。

originalText:
Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to play for each artifact you control.)
Untap all artifacts.

name: Bringer of the Blue Dawn
text:
You may pay {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may draw two cards.

foreignNames.name: Bringer des Blauen Morgens
foreignNames.text:
Du kannst {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} bezahlen, anstatt die Manakosten des Bringers des Blauen Morgens zu bezahlen.
Verursacht Trampelschaden.
Zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments kannst du 2 Karten ziehen.

foreignNames.name: Adalid del amanecer azul
foreignNames.text:
Puedes pagar {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} en lugar de pagar el coste de maná del Adalid del amanecer azul.
Arrolla.
Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, puedes robar dos cartas.

foreignNames.name: Annonciateur de l'Aube bleue
foreignNames.text:
Vous pouvez payer {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} à la place du coût de mana de l'Annonciateur de l'Aube bleue.
Piétinement
Au début de votre entretien, vous pouvez piocher deux cartes.

foreignNames.name: Portatore dell'Alba Blu
foreignNames.text:
Puoi spendere {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} invece di pagare il costo di mana del Portatore dell'Alba Blu.
Travolgere
All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, puoi pescare due carte.

foreignNames.name: 青の夜明けの運び手
foreignNames.text:
あなたは青の夜明けの運び手のマナ・コストを支払うのではなく、{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}を支払ってもよい。
トランプル
あなたのアップキープの開始時に、あなたはカードを２枚引いてもよい。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 運び手

foreignNames.name: Portador da Aurora Azul
foreignNames.text:
Você pode pagar {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} em vez de pagar o custo de mana do Portador da Aurora Azul.
Atropelar
No início de sua manutenção, você pode comprar dois cards.

foreignNames.name: 蓝曙光信使
foreignNames.text:
你可支付{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}，而不支付蓝曙光信使的法术力费用。
践踏
在你的维持开始时，你可以抓两张牌。

originalText:
You may pay {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} rather than pay Bringer of the Blue Dawn's mana cost.
Trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may draw two cards.

name: Condescend
text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

rulings.text: You scry 2 even if the spell’s controller pays {X}.
You must be able to target another spell to cast Condescend. Condescend can’t target itself.

foreignNames.name: Herablassen
foreignNames.text:
Neutralisiere einen Zauberspruch deiner Wahl, falls sein Beherrscher nicht {X} bezahlt.
Hellsicht 2 (Betrachte die obersten zwei Karten deiner Bibliothek. Lege eine beliebige Anzahl davon in beliebiger Reihenfolge unter deine Bibliothek und den Rest oben darauf.)

foreignNames.name: Condescender
foreignNames.text:
Contrarresta el hechizo objetivo a menos que su controlador pague {X}.
Adivinar 2 (Mira las dos primeras cartas de la parte superior de tu biblioteca. Pon cualquier número de ellas en la parte inferior de tu biblioteca y el resto, en la parte superior en cualquier orden.)

foreignNames.name: Condescendance
foreignNames.text:
Contrecarrez le sort ciblé à moins que son contrôleur ne paye {X}.
Regard 2 (Regardez les deux cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Mettez n'importe quel nombre d'entre elles au-dessous de votre bibliothèque et le reste, au-dessus, dans n'importe quel ordre.)

foreignNames.name: Acconsentire
foreignNames.text:
Neutralizza una magia bersaglio a meno che il suo controllore spenda {X}.
Profetizzare 2 (Guarda le prime due carte del tuo grimorio. Metti un qualsiasi numero di esse in fondo al tuo grimorio e le rimanenti in cima a esso nell'ordine che preferisci.)

foreignNames.name: 卑下
foreignNames.text:
呪文１つを対象とする。それのコントローラーが{X}を支払わないかぎり、それを打ち消す。
占術 ２ （あなたのライブラリーの一番上から２枚のカードを見る。そのうち望む枚数をあなたのライブラリーの一番下に、残りを一番上に、望む順番で置く。）

foreignNames.name: Condescender
foreignNames.text:
Anula a mágica alvo a menos que seu controlador pague {X}.
Vidência 2 (Olhe os dois cards do topo de seu grimório. Coloque qualquer número deles no fundo de seu grimório e o restante no topo em qualquer ordem.)

foreignNames.name: 睥睨
foreignNames.text:
除非目标咒语之操控者支付{X}，否则将其反击。
占卜2（检视你牌库顶的两张牌。将其中任意数量的牌置于你牌库底，其余则置于你牌库顶；你决定牌的顺序。）

originalText:
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}.
Scry 2 (Look at the top two cards of your library. Put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Disruption Aura
text:
Enchant artifact
Enchanted artifact has "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this artifact unless you pay its mana cost."
flavor: Vedalken weapons sold to outsiders are as dependable as the vedalken themselves.

rulings.text: Mana cost includes any requirements for colored mana, although most artifacts don’t have any color requirements.
If the enchanted artifact has X in its mana cost, X is 0.

foreignNames.name: Störende Aura
foreignNames.text: Das verzauberte Artefakt hat „Opfere dieses Artefakt zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments, falls du nicht seine Manakosten bezahlst."
foreignNames.flavor: Vedalken-Waffen, die an Fremde verkauft werden, sind so zuverlässig wie die Vedalken selbst.

foreignNames.name: Aura de disrupción
foreignNames.text: El artefacto encantado tiene "Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, sacrifica este artefacto a menos que pagues su coste de maná."
foreignNames.flavor: Las armas vedalken vendidas a los extranjeros son tan confiables como los mismos vedalken.

foreignNames.name: Aura de perturbation
foreignNames.text: L'artefact enchanté a « Au début de votre entretien, sacrifiez cet artefact à moins que vous ne payiez son coût de mana. »
foreignNames.flavor: Les armes que les vedalkens vendent aux étrangers sont aussi fiables que les vedalkens eux-mêmes.

foreignNames.name: Aura della Distruzione
foreignNames.text: L'artefatto incantato ha "All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, sacrifica questo artefatto a meno che tu paghi il suo costo di mana".
foreignNames.flavor: Le armi vedalken vendute agli stranieri sono affidabili quanto gli stessi vedalken.

foreignNames.name: 撹乱のオーラ
foreignNames.text: エンチャントされているアーティファクトは、「あなたのアップキープの開始時に、あなたがこのアーティファクトのマナ・コストを支払わないかぎり、このアーティファクトを生け贄に捧げる。」の能力を持つ。
foreignNames.type: エンチャント（アーティファクト）
foreignNames.flavor: 部外者に売られたヴィダルケンの武器は、ヴィダルケンそのものと同じぐらい頼りになる。

foreignNames.name: Aura de Disrupção
foreignNames.text: O artefato encantado tem "No início de sua manutenção, sacrifique este artefato a menos que você pague seu custo de mana."
foreignNames.flavor: As armas que os vedalkeanos vendem aos estrangeiros são tão confiáveis quanto eles próprios.

foreignNames.name: 散裂灵气
foreignNames.text: 受此结界的神器具有「在你的维持开始时，除非你支付此神器的法术力费用，否则牺牲之。」
foreignNames.flavor: 维多肯族卖给外地人的武器，就跟维多肯族一样值得信赖。

originalText: Enchanted artifact has "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this artifact unless you pay its mana cost."

name: Early Frost
text: Tap up to three target lands.
flavor: Under its mists, the earth sleeps.

foreignNames.name: Früher Frost
foreignNames.text: Tappe bis zu drei Länder deiner Wahl.
foreignNames.flavor: Unter seinen Nebeln schläft die Erde.

foreignNames.name: Escarcha matinal
foreignNames.text: Gira hasta tres tierras objetivo.
foreignNames.flavor: Bajo su bruma, la tierra duerme.

foreignNames.name: Gel précoce
foreignNames.text: Engagez jusqu'à trois terrains ciblés.
foreignNames.flavor: La terre sommeille sous la brume.

foreignNames.name: Prime Gelate
foreignNames.text: TAPpa fino a tre terre bersaglio.
foreignNames.flavor: Sotto la nebbia, la terra riposa.

foreignNames.name: 早霜
foreignNames.text: 土地を最大３枚まで対象とし、それらをタップする。
foreignNames.flavor: その霧の下で大地は眠る。

foreignNames.name: Geada Precoce
foreignNames.text: Vire até três terrenos alvo.
foreignNames.flavor: Por baixo de suas névoas, a terra dorme.

foreignNames.name: 早霜
foreignNames.text: 横置至多三个目标地。
foreignNames.flavor: 大地在寒雾中沉睡。

originalText: Tap up to three target lands.

name: Eyes of the Watcher
text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

rulings.text: You do the scrying at the end of the ability’s resolution (assuming you pay {1}).

foreignNames.name: Augen des Beobachters
foreignNames.text: Immer wenn du einen Spontanzauber oder eine Hexerei spielst, kannst du {1} bezahlen. Falls du dies tust, erhältst du Hellsicht 2. (Betrachte die obersten zwei Karten deiner Bibliothek und lege dann eine beliebige Anzahl davon in beliebiger Reihenfolge unter deine Bibliothek und den Rest oben darauf.)

foreignNames.name: Ojos del observador
foreignNames.text: Siempre que juegues un hechizo instantáneo o conjuro, puedes pagar {1}. Si lo haces, adivina 2. (Mira las dos primeras cartas de la parte superior de tu biblioteca, luego pon cualquier número de ellas en la parte inferior de tu biblioteca y el resto, en la parte superior en cualquier orden.)

foreignNames.name: Les yeux du gardien
foreignNames.text: À chaque fois que vous jouez un sort d'éphémère ou de rituel, vous pouvez payer {1}. Si vous faites ainsi, regard 2. (Regardez les deux cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Mettez n'importe quel nombre d'entre elles au-dessous de votre bibliothèque et le reste, au-dessus, dans n'importe quel ordre.)

foreignNames.name: Occhi dell'Osservatore
foreignNames.text: Ogniqualvolta giochi una magia istantaneo o stregoneria, puoi spendere {1}. Se lo fai, profetizzare 2. (Guarda le prime due carte del tuo grimorio, poi metti un qualsiasi numero di esse in fondo al tuo grimorio e le rimanenti in cima a esso nell'ordine che preferisci.)

foreignNames.name: 見張る者の目
foreignNames.text: あなたがインスタント呪文かソーサリー呪文をプレイするたび、あなたは{1}を支払ってもよい。そうした場合、「占術 ２」を行う。（あなたのライブラリーの一番上から２枚のカードを見て、その後、そのうち望む枚数をあなたのライブラリーの一番下に、残りを一番上に、望む順番で置く。）

foreignNames.name: Olhos do Observador
foreignNames.text: Toda vez que você jogar uma mágica instantânea ou de feitiço, você pode pagar {1}. Se o fizer, vidência 2. (Olhe os dois cards do topo de seu grimório. Coloque qualquer número deles no fundo de seu grimório e o restante no topo em qualquer ordem.)

foreignNames.name: 看守者之眼
foreignNames.text: 每当你使用瞬间或法术咒语时，你可以支付{1}。若你如此作，则占卜2。（检视你牌库顶的两张牌。将其中任意数量的牌置于你牌库底，其余则置于你牌库顶；你决定牌的顺序。）

originalText: Whenever you play an instant or sorcery spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Fold into Aether
text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, its controller may put a creature card from their hand onto the battlefield.
flavor: Æther portals drift across Mirrodin's surface, dragging creatures across time and space.

rulings.text: If the spell isn’t countered (because it’s a spell that can’t be countered, for example), nothing happens.
If your Fold into Aether counters a spell you control, you get to put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

foreignNames.name: Falte im Äther
foreignNames.text: Neutralisiere einen Zauberspruch deiner Wahl. Falls du dies tust, kann der Beherrscher dieses Zauberspruchs eine Kreaturenkarte aus seiner Hand ins Spiel bringen.
foreignNames.flavor: Ätherportale wehen über Mirrodins Oberfläche und ziehen dabei Kreaturen durch Zeit und Raum.

foreignNames.name: Plegar hacia el éter
foreignNames.text: Contrarresta el hechizo objetivo. Si lo haces, el controlador de ese hechizo puede poner en juego una carta de criatura de su mano.
foreignNames.flavor: Los portales al éter flotan sobre la superficie de Mirrodin, arrastrando criaturas a través del tiempo y el espacio.

foreignNames.name: Repli dans l'Aether
foreignNames.text: Contrecarrez le sort ciblé. Si vous faites ainsi, le contrôleur de ce sort peut mettre en jeu une carte de créature de sa main.
foreignNames.flavor: Les portails d'Aether glissent à la surface de Mirrodin, projetant les créatures dans l'espace et le temps.

foreignNames.name: Avviluppare nell'Etere
foreignNames.text: Neutralizza una magia bersaglio. Se lo fai, il controllore di quella magia può mettere in gioco una carta creatura dalla propria mano.
foreignNames.flavor: I portali eterei vanno alla deriva lungo la superficie di Mirrodin, trascinando le creature nel tempo e nello spazio.

foreignNames.name: 霊気への折り込み
foreignNames.text: 呪文１つを対象とし、それを打ち消す。そうした場合、その呪文のコントローラーは自分の手札にあるクリーチャー・カードを１枚場に出してもよい。
foreignNames.flavor: 霊気の扉はミラディン中を漂いまわり、生き物を時間も空間も飛び越えて捕まえる。

foreignNames.name: Dobrar em Éter
foreignNames.text: Anula a mágica alvo. Se você o fizer, o controlador daquela mágica pode colocar em jogo um card de criatura de sua própria mão.
foreignNames.flavor: Os portais de Éter flutuam pela superfície de Mirrodin, dragando criaturas pelo tempo e pelo espaço.

foreignNames.name: 乙太收束
foreignNames.text: 反击目标咒语。若你如此作，该咒语的操控者可以从其手上将一张生物牌放置进场。
foreignNames.flavor: 乙太时空通道在秘罗地表面游移，被卷入的生物将在时空之间迷途。

originalText: Counter target spell. If you do, that spell's controller may put a creature card from his or her hand into play.

name: Hoverguard Sweepers
text:
Flying
When Hoverguard Sweepers enters the battlefield, you may return up to two target creatures to their owners' hands.
flavor: They only appear in emergencies, and emergencies never last long.

foreignNames.name: Aufräumender Schwebgardist
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
Wenn der Aufräumende Schwebgardist ins Spiel kommt, kannst du bis zu zwei Kreaturen deiner Wahl auf die Hand ihrer Besitzer zurückschicken.
foreignNames.flavor: Sie tauchen nur in Notlagen auf, und Notlagen dauern nie lange.

foreignNames.name: Barredores aeroguarda
foreignNames.text:
Vuela.
Cuando los Barredores aeroguarda entren en juego, puedes regresar hasta dos criaturas objetivo a las manos de sus propietarios.
foreignNames.flavor: Sólo aparecen en caso de emergencia, y las emergencias nunca duran mucho.

foreignNames.name: Balayeurs aérogardes
foreignNames.text:
Vol
Quand les Balayeurs aérogardes arrivent en jeu, vous pouvez renvoyer jusqu'à deux créatures ciblées dans la main de leurs propriétaires.
foreignNames.flavor: Ils n'apparaissent qu'en cas d'urgence, et celles-ci ne durent jamais longtemps.

foreignNames.name: Spazzatori Aerocustodi
foreignNames.text:
Volare
Quando gli Spazzatori Aerocustodi entrano in gioco, puoi far riprendere in mano ai proprietari fino a due creature bersaglio.
foreignNames.flavor: Appaiono solo in casi di emergenza e le emergenze non durano mai a lungo.

foreignNames.name: 空護りの掃討者
foreignNames.text:
飛行
空護りの掃討者が場に出たとき、クリーチャーを最大２体まで対象とする。あなたはそれらをオーナーの手札に戻してもよい。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — ドローン
foreignNames.flavor: 彼らは緊急のときのみ現れるが、その緊急事態も長くは続かない。

foreignNames.name: Guardas-de-Ronda Varredores
foreignNames.text:
Voar
Quando Guardas-de-Ronda Varredores entra em jogo, você pode devolver até duas criaturas alvo para as mãos de seus donos.
foreignNames.flavor: Eles só aparecem em emergências, e as emergências costumam não se prolongar.

foreignNames.name: 空卫扫荡队
foreignNames.text:
飞行
当空卫扫荡队进场时，你可以将至多两个目标生物移回其拥有者的手上。
foreignNames.flavor: 他们只在紧急状况现身，而紧急状况从不会持续太久。

originalText:
Flying
When Hoverguard Sweepers comes into play, you may return up to two target creatures to their owners' hands.

name: Into Thin Air
text:
Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)
Return target artifact to its owner's hand.
flavor:
"Perhaps I should take Mirrodin apart and begin again."
—Memnarch

foreignNames.name: In Luft aufgelöst
foreignNames.text:
Affinität zu Artefakten (Dieser Zauberspruch kostet beim Ausspielen für jedes Artefakt, das du kontrollierst, {1} weniger.)
Bringe ein Artefakt deiner Wahl auf die Hand seines Besitzers zurück.
foreignNames.flavor: „Vielleicht sollte ich Mirrodin auseinander nehmen und noch einmal von vorn anfangen." — Memnarch

foreignNames.name: Hacerse humo
foreignNames.text:
Afinidad por artefactos. (Este hechizo te cuesta {1} menos para jugarlo por cada artefacto que controles.)
Regresa el artefacto objetivo a la mano de su propietario.
foreignNames.flavor: "Tal vez debería desarmar Mirrodin por completo y comenzar de nuevo." —Memnarch

foreignNames.name: Volatilisation
foreignNames.text:
Affinité pour les artefacts (Ce sort coûte {1} de moins à jouer pour chaque artefact que vous contrôlez.)
Renvoyez l'artefact ciblé dans la main de son propriétaire.
foreignNames.flavor: « Peut-être devrais-je détruire Mirrodin et tout recommencer à zéro. » —Memnarch

foreignNames.name: Nel Nulla
foreignNames.text:
Affinità con gli artefatti (Questa magia costa {1} in meno per essere giocata per ogni artefatto che controlli.)
Il proprietario riprende in mano un artefatto bersaglio.
foreignNames.flavor: "Forse dovrei fare a pezzi Mirrodin e ricominciare da capo." —Memnarch

foreignNames.name: 霧散
foreignNames.text:
親和（アーティファクト） （この呪文をプレイするためのコストは、あなたがコントロールするアーティファクト１つにつき{1}少なくなる。）
アーティファクト１つを対象とし、それをオーナーの手札に戻す。
foreignNames.flavor: ミラディンを破壊しやりなおすべきなのだろうな。 ――メムナーク

foreignNames.name: Desvanescer
foreignNames.text:
Afinidade por artefatos (Esta mágica custa {1} a menos para jogar para cada artefato que você controla.)
Devolve o artefato alvo para a mão de seu dono.
foreignNames.flavor: "Talvez eu devesse desmontar Mirrodin e recomeçar do zero." —Memnarca

foreignNames.name: 凭空消失
foreignNames.text:
神器共鸣（你每操控一个神器，使用此咒语的费用便减少{1}来使用）
将目标神器移回其拥有者手上。
foreignNames.flavor: 「我或许该把秘罗地整个拆开再重新来过。」 ～蒙纳珂

originalText:
Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to play for each artifact you control.)
Return target artifact to its owner's hand.

name: Plasma Elemental
text: Plasma Elemental can't be blocked.
flavor:
"I watched a ship sail right through it. I thought it was harmless . . . until I saw what it had done to the crew."
—Bruenna, Neurok leader

foreignNames.name: Plasmaelementar
foreignNames.text: Das Plasmaelementar ist unblockbar.
foreignNames.flavor: „Ich sah, wie das Schiff durch es hindurch segelte, und ich dachte, es sei harmlos ... bis ich feststellen musste, was es mit der Crew gemacht hatte." — Bruenna, Anführerin der Neurok

foreignNames.name: Elemental de plasma
foreignNames.text: El Elemental de plasma es imbloqueable.
foreignNames.flavor: "Observé cómo un barco navegaba directo a través de él. Pensé que era inofensivo. . . hasta que vi lo que le había hecho a la tripulación." —Bruenna, líder néurok

foreignNames.name: Élémental de plasma
foreignNames.text: L'Élémental de plasma est imblocable.
foreignNames.flavor: « J'ai vu un navire le traverser. Je le croyais inoffensif . . . Puis j'ai vu ce qu'il avait fait à l'équipage. » —Bruenna, chef des Neuroks

foreignNames.name: Elementale di Plasma
foreignNames.text: L'Elementale di Plasma non può essere bloccato.
foreignNames.flavor: "Osservai una nave passarci attraverso. Pensai fosse innocuo, finché non vidi ciò che aveva fatto all'equipaggio." —Bruenna, condottiera neuraca

foreignNames.name: プラズマの精霊
foreignNames.text: プラズマの精霊はブロックされない。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — エレメンタル
foreignNames.flavor: 中を船が抜けていくのを見たわ。何の危害も加えないみたいだと思ったんだけど……船員を見て気が変わったわね。 ―― ニューロックの指導者ブルエナ

foreignNames.name: Elemental de Plasma
foreignNames.text: Elemental de Plasma não pode ser bloqueado.
foreignNames.flavor: "Eu vi um navio passar bem no meio dele. Pensei que ele era inofensivo . . . até ver o que ele tinha feito com a tripulação." —Bruenna, líder dos Neuroques

foreignNames.name: 电浆元素
foreignNames.text: 电浆元素不能被阻挡。
foreignNames.flavor: 「我看着一艘船穿过它身躯；而在我发现它是怎么对付船员之前，还猜想这东西该伤不了人。」 ～纽若克统领布威娜

originalText: Plasma Elemental is unblockable.

name: Qumulox
text:
Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)
Flying
flavor: Even the clouds bend themselves to Memnarch's will, eager to swallow those who oppose him.

foreignNames.name: Wolkolyp
foreignNames.text:
Affinität zu Artefakten (Dieser Zauberspruch kostet beim Ausspielen für jedes Artefakt, das du kontrollierst, {1} weniger.)
Fliegend
foreignNames.flavor: Selbst die Wolken unterwerfen sich Memnarchs Willen und verschlucken eifrig alles, was sich ihm widersetzt.

foreignNames.name: Cúmulox
foreignNames.text:
Afinidad por artefactos. (Este hechizo te cuesta {1} menos para jugarlo por cada artefacto que controles.)
Vuela.
foreignNames.flavor: Incluso las nubes se inclinan ante la voluntad de Memnarch, ansiosas de devorar a aquellos que se le oponen.

foreignNames.name: Qumulox
foreignNames.text:
Affinité pour les artefacts (Ce sort coûte {1} de moins à jouer pour chaque artefact que vous contrôlez.)
Vol
foreignNames.flavor: Même les nuages se plient à la volonté de Memnarch, avalant ceux qui osent s'opposer à lui.

foreignNames.name: Cumulipo
foreignNames.text:
Affinità con gli artefatti (Questa magia costa {1} in meno per essere giocata per ogni artefatto che controlli.)
Volare
foreignNames.flavor: Anche le nuvole si piegano al volere di Memnarch, ansioso di inghiottire chiunque osi opporsi a lui.

foreignNames.name: クムラックス
foreignNames.text:
親和（アーティファクト） （この呪文をプレイするためのコストは、あなたがコントロールするアーティファクト１つにつき{1}少なくなる。）
飛行
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — ビースト
foreignNames.flavor: 雲すらもメムナークの意思に従って形を変え、彼に逆らう者を飲み込もうとする。

foreignNames.name: Qumulox
foreignNames.text:
Afinidade por artefatos (Esta mágica custa {1} a menos para jogar para cada artefato que você controla.)
Voar
foreignNames.flavor: Até mesmo as nuvens se curvam à vontade do Memnarca, sedentas por engolir aqueles que se opõem a ele.

foreignNames.name: 百爪云
foreignNames.text:
神器共鸣（你每操控一个神器，使用此咒语的费用便减少{1}来使用）
飞行
foreignNames.flavor: 连云都屈从于蒙纳珂，朝其忤逆者狂卷而去。

originalText:
Affinity for artifacts (This spell costs {1} less to play for each artifact you control.)
Flying

name: Serum Visions
text: Draw a card. Scry 2.

foreignNames.name: Visionen nach Serumsgenuss
foreignNames.text:
Ziehe eine Karte.
Hellsicht 2 (Betrachte die obersten zwei Karten deiner Bibliothek. Lege eine beliebige Anzahl davon in beliebiger Reihenfolge unter deine Bibliothek und den Rest oben darauf.)

foreignNames.name: Visiones del suero
foreignNames.text:
Roba una carta.
Adivinar 2 (Mira las dos primeras cartas de la parte superior de tu biblioteca. Pon cualquier número de ellas en la parte inferior de tu biblioteca y el resto, en la parte superior en cualquier orden.)

foreignNames.name: Visions nées du sérum
foreignNames.text:
Piochez une carte.
Regard 2 (Regardez les deux cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Mettez n'importe quel nombre d'entre elles au-dessous de votre bibliothèque et le reste, au-dessus, dans n'importe quel ordre.)

foreignNames.name: Visioni del Siero
foreignNames.text:
Pesca una carta.
Profetizzare 2 (Guarda le prime due carte del tuo grimorio. Metti un qualsiasi numero di esse in fondo al tuo grimorio e le rimanenti in cima a esso nell'ordine che preferisci.)

foreignNames.name: 血清の幻視
foreignNames.text:
カードを１枚引く。
占術 ２ （あなたのライブラリーの一番上から２枚のカードを見る。そのうち望む枚数をあなたのライブラリーの一番下に、残りを一番上に、望む順番で置く。）

foreignNames.name: Visões do Soro
foreignNames.text:
Compre um card.
Vidência 2 (Olhe os dois cards do topo de seu grimório. Coloque qualquer número deles no fundo de seu grimório e o restante no topo em qualquer ordem.)

foreignNames.name: 浆液预视
foreignNames.text:
抓一张牌。
占卜2（检视你牌库顶的两张牌。将其中任意数量的牌置于你牌库底，其余则置于你牌库顶；你决定牌的顺序。）

originalText:
Draw a card.
Scry 2 (Look at the top two cards of your library. Put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Spectral Shift
text:
Choose one —
• Change the text of target spell or permanent by replacing all instances of one basic land type with another. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
• Change the text of target spell or permanent by replacing all instances of one color word with another. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
Entwine {2} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

rulings.text: Because of updated targeting rulings, it’s possible to target the same spell or permanent with both abilities when cast with Entwine.

foreignNames.name: Spektralwechsel
foreignNames.text:
Bestimme eines Verändere den Text eines Zauberspruchs oder einer bleibenden Karte deiner Wahl, indem du im Text alle Vorkommen eines Standardlandtyps durch einen anderen ersetzt; oder verändere den Text eines Zauberspruchs oder einer bleibenden Karte deiner Wahl, indem du im Text alle Vorkommen einer Farbe durch eine andere ersetzt. (Diese Effekte enden nicht am Ende des Zuges.)
Verflechtung {2}

foreignNames.name: Cambio espectral
foreignNames.text:
Elige uno: Cambia el texto del hechizo o permanente objetivo reemplazando todas las referencias a un tipo de tierra básica con otro; o cambia el texto del hechizo o permanente objetivo reemplazando todas las referencias a un color con otro. (Estos efectos no terminan al final del turno.)
Entrelazar {2}

foreignNames.name: Changement spectral
foreignNames.text:
Choisissez l'un — Changez le texte du sort ou du permanent ciblé en remplaçant toutes les occurrences d'un type de terrain de base par un autre ; ou changez le texte du sort ou du permanent ciblé en remplaçant toutes les occurrences d'un mot de couleur par un autre.(Ces effets ne s'arrêtent pas à la fin du tour.)
Union {2}

foreignNames.name: Variazione Spettrale
foreignNames.text:
Scegli una delle opzioni seguenti Cambia il testo di una magia o di un permanente bersaglio sostituendo in tutte le occasioni un tipo di terra base con un altro; oppure cambia il testo di una magia o di un permanente bersaglio sostituendo in tutte le occasioni il nome di un colore con un altro. (Questi effetti non terminano alla fine del turno.)
Intrecciare {2}

foreignNames.name: 幽体の変容
foreignNames.text:
以下の２つから１つを選ぶ。「呪文１つかパーマネント１つを対象とし、それに書かれた基本地形タイプ１種類をすべて別な基本地形タイプに置き換える。」「呪文１つかパーマネント１つを対象とし、それに書かれた色を表す言葉１種類をすべて別な色に置き換える。」
双呪 {2}

foreignNames.name: Mudança Espectral
foreignNames.text:
Escolha um Mude o texto da mágica ou da permanente alvo substituindo todas as referências a um tipo de terreno básico por outro; ou mude o texto da mágica ou da permanente alvo substituindo todas as referências ao nome de uma cor por outra. (Esses efeitos não cessam no final do turno.)
Entrelaçar {2}

foreignNames.name: 光谱变幻
foreignNames.text:
选择一项～更改目标咒语或永久物的规则叙述文字，将其中一种基本地类别文字全部更改为另一种；或是更改目标咒语或永久物的规则叙述文字，将其中一种颜色文字全部更改为另一种。（此类效应不因回合结束而终止）
打包{2}

originalText:
Choose one Change the text of target spell or permanent by replacing all instances of one basic land type with another; or change the text of target spell or permanent by replacing all instances of one color word with another. (These effects don't end at end of turn.)
Entwine {2}

name: Thought Courier
text: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
flavor: It is telling of the vedalkens' culture that they trust human couriers more than their own comrades.

foreignNames.name: Gedankenübermittler
foreignNames.text: {T}: Ziehe eine Karte und wirf dann eine Karte aus deiner Hand ab.
foreignNames.flavor: Es ist bezeichnend für die Kultur der Vedalken, dass sie menschlichen Boten mehr trauen als ihren eigenen Kameraden.

foreignNames.name: Mensajero del pensamiento
foreignNames.text: {T}: Roba una carta, luego descarta una carta de tu mano.
foreignNames.flavor: Es un hecho de la cultura vedalken que confíen más en los mensajeros humanos que en sus propios camaradas.

foreignNames.name: Messager des pensées
foreignNames.text: {T} : Piochez une carte, puis défaussez-vous d'une carte de votre main.
foreignNames.flavor: Il est révélateur que les vedalkens fassent plus confiance aux messagers humains qu'à ceux de leur race.

foreignNames.name: Messaggero Psichico
foreignNames.text: {T}: Pesca una carta, poi scarta una carta dalla tua mano.
foreignNames.flavor: Dice molto della cultura vedalken il fatto che si fidino più dei messaggeri umani che dei loro stessi compagni.

foreignNames.name: 思考の急使
foreignNames.text: {T}：カードを１枚引き、その後あなたの手札からカードを１枚捨てる。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 人間・ウィザード
foreignNames.flavor: ヴィダルケンが自分の同僚よりも人間の使者を信用することからも、彼らの文明の何たるかがわかる。

foreignNames.name: Mensageiro de Pensamentos
foreignNames.text: {T}: Compre um card e depois descarte um card de sua mão.
foreignNames.flavor: É fato conhecido na cultura dos vedalkeanos que eles confiam mais em mensageiros humanos do que nos seus próprios camaradas .

foreignNames.name: 心念讯使
foreignNames.text: {T}：抓一张牌，然后从你手上弃掉一张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 维多肯文化展露出此现象：他们对人类讯使的信任还多于自己同胞。

originalText: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card from your hand.

name: Trinket Mage
text: When Trinket Mage enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with mana value 1 or less, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

rulings.text: If a card in a player’s library has {X} in its mana cost, X is considered to be 0.

foreignNames.name: Plundermagier
foreignNames.text: Wenn der Plundermagier ins Spiel kommt, kannst du deine Bibliothek nach einer Artefaktkarte mit umgewandelten Manakosten von 1 oder weniger durchsuchen, diese Karte offen vorzeigen und sie auf deine Hand nehmen. Falls du dies tust, mische danach deine Bibliothek.

foreignNames.name: Mago de baratijas
foreignNames.text: Cuando el Mago de baratijas entre en juego, puedes buscar en tu biblioteca una carta de artefacto con coste de maná convertido de 1 o menos, mostrarla y ponerla en tu mano. Si lo haces, baraja tu biblioteca.

foreignNames.name: Mage aux breloques
foreignNames.text: Quand le Mage aux breloques arrive en jeu, vous pouvez chercher dans votre bibliothèque une carte d'artefact avec un coût converti de mana de 1 ou moins, révéler cette carte et la mettre dans votre main. Si vous faites ainsi, mélangez votre bibliothèque.

foreignNames.name: Mago dei Gingilli
foreignNames.text: Quando il Mago dei Gingilli entra in gioco, puoi passare in rassegna il tuo grimorio, scegliere una carta artefatto con costo di mana convertito pari o inferiore a 1, rivelare quella carta e aggiungerla alla tua mano. Se lo fai, rimescola il tuo grimorio.

foreignNames.name: 粗石の魔道士
foreignNames.text: 粗石の魔道士が場に出たとき、あなたは自分のライブラリーから点数で見たマナ・コストが１以下のアーティファクト・カードを１枚探し、公開してあなたの手札に加えてもよい。そうした場合、あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 人間・ウィザード

foreignNames.name: Mago das Quinquilharias
foreignNames.text: Quando Mago das Quinquilharias entra em jogo, você pode procurar em seu grimório por um card de artefato com custo de mana convertido menor ou igual a 1, revelá-lo e colocá-lo em sua mão. Se o fizer, embaralhe seu grimório.

foreignNames.name: 琐物法师
foreignNames.text: 当琐物法师进场时，你可以从你的牌库中搜寻一张总法术力费用等于或小于1的神器牌，展示该牌，并置于你手上。若你如此作，将你的牌库洗牌。

originalText: When Trinket Mage comes into play, you may search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost 1 or less, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

name: Vedalken Mastermind
text: {U}, {T}: Return target permanent you control to its owner's hand.
flavor: The vedalken see other beings from a cold distance, as either experimental subjects or objects of study.

foreignNames.name: Vedalken-Genie
foreignNames.text: {U}, {T}: Bringe eine bleibende Karte deiner Wahl, die du kontrollierst, auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurück.
foreignNames.flavor: Die Vedalken sehen andere Wesen mit kühler Distanz entweder als Versuchsobjekte oder als Anschauungsbeispiele.

foreignNames.name: Mente maestra vedalken
foreignNames.text: {U}, {T}: Regresa el permanente objetivo que controles a la mano de su propietario.
foreignNames.flavor: Los vedalken ven a otros seres desde una distancia prudente, ya sea como sujetos de experimentación o como objetos de estudio.

foreignNames.name: Érudit vedalken
foreignNames.text: {U}, {T} : Renvoyez le permanent ciblé que vous contrôlez dans la main de son propriétaire.
foreignNames.flavor: Les vedalkens se montrent distants envers les autres êtres, qu'ils considèrent comme cobayes ou sujets d'étude.

foreignNames.name: Genio Vedalken
foreignNames.text: {U}, {T}: Il proprietario riprende in mano un permanente bersaglio che tu controlli.
foreignNames.flavor: I vedalken guardano le altre creature viventi con freddo distacco, come cavie per gli esperimenti e oggetti di studio.

foreignNames.name: ヴィダルケンの黒幕
foreignNames.text: {U}, {T}：あなたがコントロールしているパーマネント１つを対象とし、それをオーナーの手札に戻す。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — ヴィダルケン・ウィザード
foreignNames.flavor: ヴィダルケンは他の生き物を冷めた目で見ている。彼らは実験道具か研究対象に過ぎないのだ。

foreignNames.name: Vedalkeano de Inteligência Superior
foreignNames.text: {U}, {T}: Devolve a permanente alvo que você controla para a mão de seu dono.
foreignNames.flavor: Os vedalkeanos encaram os outros seres com fria indiferença, considerando-os como experimentos ou objetos de estudo.

foreignNames.name: 维多肯谋士
foreignNames.text: {U}，{T}：将目标由你操控的永久物移回其拥有者手上。
foreignNames.flavor: 维多肯族总保持距离冷眼旁观他族，一如看待实验对象或研究标的。

originalText: {U}, {T}: Return target permanent you control to its owner's hand.

name: Beacon of Unrest
text: Put target artifact or creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. Shuffle Beacon of Unrest into its owner's library.
flavor: A vertical scream pierces the night air and echoes doom through the clouds.

rulings.text: If the target card is an illegal target by the time Beacon of Unrest tries to resolve, the spell won't resolve. You won't shuffle it into your library.
In a multiplayer game, if a player leaves the game, all cards that player owns leave as well. If you leave the game, the permanent you control from Beacon of Unrest is exiled.

foreignNames.name: Leitstern der Unruhe
foreignNames.text: Bringe eine Artefakt- oder Kreaturenkarte deiner Wahl aus einem Friedhof unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel. Mische den Leitstern der Unruhe in die Bibliothek seines Besitzers.
foreignNames.flavor: Ein Schrei durchschneidet senkrecht die Nachtluft, und Verderben hallt durch die Wolken.

foreignNames.name: Faro de desasosiego
foreignNames.text: Pon en juego bajo tu control la carta de artefacto o criatura objetivo de un cementerio. Baraja el Faro de desasosiego en la biblioteca de su propietario.
foreignNames.flavor: Un grito vertical perfora el aire nocturno y anuncia la perdición entre las nubes.

foreignNames.name: Flambeau de l'Inquiétude
foreignNames.text: Mettez en jeu sous votre contrôle une carte de créature ou d'artefact ciblée d'un cimetière. Mélangez le Flambeau de l'Inquiétude à la bibliothèque de son propriétaire.
foreignNames.flavor: Un cri vertical perce la nuit et se répercute, telle la mort, dans les nuages.

foreignNames.name: Faro dell'Inquietudine
foreignNames.text: Metti in gioco sotto il tuo controllo una carta artefatto o creatura bersaglio presente in un cimitero. Rimescola il Faro dell'Inquietudine nel grimorio del suo proprietario.
foreignNames.flavor: Un urlo al cielo squarcia l'aria della notte e fa riecheggiare il destino tra le nubi.

foreignNames.name: 不穏の標
foreignNames.text: いずれかの墓地にあるアーティファクト・カード１枚かクリーチャー・カード１枚を対象とし、それをあなたのコントロール下で場に出す。不穏の標をオーナーのライブラリーに加えて切り直す。
foreignNames.flavor: 天からの叫び声が夜空を引き裂き、雲間から運命の響きを轟かせる。

foreignNames.name: Guia da Inquietação
foreignNames.text: Coloque em jogo sob o seu controle o card alvo de artefato ou de criatura de um cemitério. Embaralhe Guia da Inquietação no grimório de seu dono.
foreignNames.flavor: Um grito agudo atravessa a noite e ecoa perdição por entre as nuvens.

foreignNames.name: 不息信标
foreignNames.text: 将任一坟墓场中的目标神器或生物牌在你的操控下放置进场。将不息信标洗入其拥有者的牌库。
foreignNames.flavor: 悚栗凄嚎划破夜空，厄运祸音回荡云际。

originalText: Put target artifact or creature card from a graveyard into play under your control. Shuffle Beacon of Unrest into its owner's library.

name: Blind Creeper
text: Whenever a player casts a spell, Blind Creeper gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: It shuns everything except its next meal.

rulings.text: This ability triggers off anyone casting a spell, including you, not just Blind Creeper’s controller or an opponent.

foreignNames.name: Blinder Kriecher
foreignNames.text: Immer wenn ein Spieler einen Zauberspruch spielt, erhält der Blinde Kriecher -1/-1 bis zum Ende des Zuges.
foreignNames.flavor: Er weicht allem aus außer seiner nächsten Mahlzeit.

foreignNames.name: Trepador ciego
foreignNames.text: Siempre que un jugador juegue un hechizo, el Trepador ciego obtiene -1/-1 hasta el final del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Evita todo excepto su próxima comida.

foreignNames.name: Fureteur aveugle
foreignNames.text: À chaque fois qu'un joueur joue un sort, le Fureteur aveugle gagne -1/-1 jusqu'à la fin du tour.
foreignNames.flavor: Son prochain repas est la seule chose qu'il n'esquive pas.

foreignNames.name: Strisciante Cieco
foreignNames.text: Ogniqualvolta un giocatore gioca una magia, lo Strisciante Cieco prende -1/-1 fino alla fine del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Evita qualsiasi cosa, tranne il suo prossimo pranzo.

foreignNames.name: 盲目の忍び寄るもの
foreignNames.text: いずれかのプレイヤーが呪文をプレイするたび、盲目の忍び寄るものはターン終了時まで-1/-1の修整を受ける。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — ゾンビ・ビースト
foreignNames.flavor: そいつは次の餌以外からは身を潜める。

foreignNames.name: Rastejador Cego
foreignNames.text: Toda vez que um jogador jogar uma mágica, Rastejador Cego recebe -1/-1 até o final do turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Ele foge de tudo menos de sua próxima refeição.

foreignNames.name: 盲目匍行兽
foreignNames.text: 每当牌手使用咒语时，盲目匍行兽得-1/-1直到回合结束。
foreignNames.flavor: 除了餐点之外，它什么都不想招惹。

originalText: Whenever a player plays a spell, Blind Creeper gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

name: Bringer of the Black Dawn
text:
You may pay {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay 2 life. If you do, search your library for a card, then shuffle and put that card on top.

foreignNames.name: Bringer des Schwarzen Morgens
foreignNames.text:
Du kannst {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} bezahlen, anstatt die Manakosten des Bringers des Schwarzen Morgens zu bezahlen.
Verursacht Trampelschaden.
Zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments kannst du 2 Lebenspunkte bezahlen. Falls du dies tust, durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einer Karte, mische dann deine Bibliothek und lege diese Karte oben auf deine Bibliothek.

foreignNames.name: Adalid del amanecer negro
foreignNames.text:
Puedes pagar {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} en lugar de pagar el coste de maná del Adalid del amanecer negro.
Arrolla.
Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, puedes pagar 2 vidas. Si lo haces, busca una carta en tu biblioteca, luego barájala y pon esa carta en la parte superior de la biblioteca.

foreignNames.name: Annonciateur de l'Aube noire
foreignNames.text:
Vous pouvez payer {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} à la place du coût de mana de l'Annonciateur de l'Aube noire.
Piétinement
Au début de votre entretien, vous pouvez payer 2 points de vie. Si vous faites ainsi, cherchez une carte dans votre bibliothèque, mélangez votre bibliothèque et mettez ensuite cette carte au-dessus d'elle.

foreignNames.name: Portatore dell'Alba Nera
foreignNames.text:
Puoi spendere {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} invece di pagare il costo di mana del Portatore dell'Alba Nera.
Travolgere
All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, puoi pagare 2 punti vita. Se lo fai, passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio, scegli una carta, poi rimescola il tuo grimorio e metti quella carta in cima a esso.

foreignNames.name: 黒の夜明けの運び手
foreignNames.text:
あなたは黒の夜明けを運び手のマナ・コストを支払うのではなく、{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}を支払ってもよい。
トランプル
あなたのアップキープの開始時に、あなたは２点のライフを支払ってもよい。そうした場合、あなたのライブラリーからカードを１枚探し、その後ライブラリーを切り直してそのカードを一番上に置く。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 運び手

foreignNames.name: Portador da Aurora Preta
foreignNames.text:
Você pode pagar {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} em vez de pagar o custo de mana do Portador da Aurora Preta.
Atropelar
No início de sua manutenção, você pode pagar 2 pontos de vida. Se o fizer, procure em seu grimório por um card, embaralhe o seu grimório e depois coloque aquele card no topo dele.

foreignNames.name: 黑曙光信使
foreignNames.text:
你可支付{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}，而不支付黑曙光信使的法术力费用。
践踏
在你的维持开始时，你可以支付2点生命。若你如此作，则从你的牌库中搜寻一张牌，然后将你的牌库洗牌，并将该牌置于其上。

name: Devour in Shadow
text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. You lose life equal to that creature's toughness.
flavor:
"Feel the burn of the mists. Master them. They will devour your enemies."
—Geth, keeper of the Vault

foreignNames.name: Von Schatten verschlungen
foreignNames.text: Zerstöre eine Kreatur deiner Wahl. Sie kann nicht regeneriert werden. Du verlierst Lebenspunkte in Höhe der Widerstandskraft dieser Kreatur.

foreignNames.name: Ombre affamée
foreignNames.text: Détruisez la créature ciblée. Elle ne peut pas être régénérée. Vous perdez un nombre de points de vie égal à l'endurance de cette créature.

foreignNames.name: Divorare nell'Ombra

foreignNames.flavor: "Percepisci l'ardore delle nebbie. Controllale e divoreranno i tuoi nemici." —Geth, custode della Volta

foreignNames.name: 影の中の貪り

foreignNames.name: Devorar nas Sombras

foreignNames.flavor: "Sente o queimar das névoas. Domina-as. Elas devorarão teus inimigos." —Geth, custódio da Câmara

name: Endless Whispers
text: Each creature has "When this creature dies, choose target opponent. That player puts this card from its owner's graveyard onto the battlefield under their control at the beginning of the next end step."
flavor: Those who find death under the black sun's shadow cannot escape its pull.

rulings.text: The creatures have the triggered ability, so each creature’s controller chooses one of their opponents to target.

foreignNames.name: Endloses Flüstern
foreignNames.text: Jede Kreatur hat „Wenn diese Kreatur aus dem Spiel auf einen Friedhof gelegt wird, bestimme einen Gegner deiner Wahl. Dieser Spieler bringt am Ende des Zuges diese Kreaturenkarte aus diesem Friedhof unter seiner Kontrolle ins Spiel."
foreignNames.flavor: Wer im Schatten der schwarzen Sonne den Tod antrifft, kann seiner Anziehung nicht widerstehen.

foreignNames.name: Susurros interminables
foreignNames.text: Cada criatura tiene "Cuando esta criatura vaya a un cementerio desde el juego, elige un oponente objetivo. Ese jugador pone en juego bajo su control esta carta de criatura de ese cementerio al final del turno."
foreignNames.flavor: Aquellos que encuentran la muerte bajo la sombra del sol negro no pueden escapar de su atracción.

foreignNames.name: Chuchotements interminables
foreignNames.text: Chaque créature a « Quand cette créature est mise dans un cimetière depuis le jeu, choisissez l'adversaire ciblé. Ce joueur met en jeu cette carte, sous son contrôle, depuis ce cimetière à la fin du tour. »
foreignNames.flavor: Quiconque trouve la mort à l'ombre du soleil noir ne peut résister à son appel.

foreignNames.name: Sussurri Infiniti
foreignNames.text: Ciascuna creatura ha "Quando questa creatura viene messa in un cimitero dal gioco, scegli un avversario bersaglio. Quel giocatore mette in gioco sotto il proprio controllo questa carta creatura da quel cimitero alla fine del turno."
foreignNames.flavor: Coloro che trovano la morte all'ombra del sole nero non possono fuggirne il richiamo.

foreignNames.name: 終わりなき囁き

foreignNames.flavor: 黒の太陽の影の下で死とまみえた者は、そこから逃れる術を持たない。

foreignNames.name: Sussurros Intermináveis

foreignNames.name: 无尽细语

rulings.text: Because damage remains marked on a creature until the damage is removed as the turn ends, nonlethal damage dealt to one Relentless Rats may become lethal if another Relentless Rats leaves the battlefield during that turn.

The last ability of Relentless Rats lets you ignore the “four-of” rule. It doesn’t let you ignore format legality. For example, during a Time Spiral Remastered Limited event, you can’t add Relentless Rats from your personal collection.

name: Magma Jet

rulings.text: When you scry, you may put all the cards you look at back on top of your library, you may put all of those cards on the bottom of your library, or you may put some of those cards on top and the rest of them on the bottom.
You choose how to order cards returned to your library after scrying no matter where you put them.
You perform the actions stated on a card in sequence. For some spells and abilities, that means you'll scry last. For others, that means you'll scry and then perform other actions.

Scry appears on some spells and abilities with one or more targets. If all of the spell or ability's targets are illegal when it tries to resolve, it won't resolve and none of its effects will happen. You won't scry.

originalText:
Choose one Destroy target artifact; or destroy target land.

name: Reversal of Fortune
text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You may copy an instant or sorcery card in it. If you do, you may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.
flavor: "Why learn hundreds of spells when you can learn only one and use it to steal hundreds?"

rulings.text: You cast the copy while this ability is resolving and still on the stack. Normally, you’re not allowed to cast spells or activate abilities at this time. Reversal of Fortune provides an exception.
You don’t pay the spell’s mana cost. If the spell has X in its mana cost, X is 0. You do pay any additional costs for that spell. You can’t use any alternative costs.
If the copied card is a split card, you may choose to cast either side of the split card but not both.
Reversal of Fortune creates a copy of the card in the other player’s hand, then allows you to cast the copy from that player’s hand without paying its mana cost.
You can’t cast the copy unless all of its targets, if any, can be chosen.
If you don’t want to cast the copy, you can choose not to; the copy ceases to exist the next time state-based actions are checked.
The spell is cast from your opponent’s hand, not yours, which can be important for some cards.

You can’t cast the copy if an effect prevents you from casting instants or sorceries, or from casting that particular instant or sorcery. It doesn’t matter whether your opponent can cast the card at this time; the only thing that matters is whether you can cast it.
The creation of the copy and then the casting of the copy are both optional.

name: All Suns' Dawn
text: For each color, return up to one target card of that color from your graveyard to your hand. Exile All Suns' Dawn.

rulings.text: All Suns’ Dawn can have from zero to five targets, one for each color.
You can target two blue-and-white multicolored cards by choosing one as the blue card and one as the white card.

You choose the color each target must be when you choose it as a target, so if the card you targeted as a blue card is red when All Suns’ Dawn resolves, the card is an illegal target, even if the spell doesn’t target another red card.

name: Tornado Elemental
text:
When Tornado Elemental enters the battlefield, it deals 6 damage to each creature with flying.
You may have Tornado Elemental assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

rulings.text: You can decide to assign damage to the defending player or planeswalker even if the blocking creature has protection from green or damage preventing effects on it.

When assigning combat damage, you choose whether you want to assign all damage to blocking creatures, or if you want to assign all of it to the player or planeswalker this creature is attacking. You can’t split the damage assignment between them.
If blocked by a creature with banding, the defending player decides whether or not the damage is assigned “as though it weren’t blocked”.
